page.title: 19 High Trees Farm & Greyfield
page.content: Owned by-MrHickman & the Retreat Est. Farmer-MrThornycroft,(inc part of Arley Wood).Field boundaries mainly unchanged .Public footpaths-little used.Crops-wh- eat,maize,barley,grass.Owns most modern machinery.Live stock-160 heads,1 bull (fresian).Dairy-2 milked 2x daily.Milk sold to'Unigate'.Cows go to market in Kidderminster.Pheasents bred.Pests- pigeons.Some deer come from Arley Wood to eat the barley.Yield from crops inc- reased 3x in 40 yrs.Outbuildings 15-20 sheds,2 indoor grainstores.2 farm work- ers live locally. Browns Farm-102 acres owned & run by Timmingtons(29 yrs).Wheat,barley,oats, potatoes.Modern machinery owned & co- ntracted out.Fresians-beef.Poultry. Little used footpaths.Farmhouse(1690) -see New Victoria History.4 farm wor- kers.
